open.title: Netstream outage | Fourways
open.description: Netstream has informed us of a network outage affecting Fourways, affected clients will experience no connectivity. This outage is due to a blown transformer in the area, resulting in no power. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Affected sites listed below:

The Pinnacle
Il Villaggio
Northern View
